questions.question: Write Python code to create a list of 5 subjects and print all items using a for loop.
Write Python code to create a list of 5 numbers and print the first item using positive index.
Write Python code to create a list of 5 fruits and print the last item using negative index.
Write Python code to print numbers from 1 to 20.
Write Python code to print odd numbers from 1 to 15.
Write Python code to check if a number is positive or negative.
Write Python code to check if a number is divisible by 5.
Write Python code to print "Hello" 5 times using a for loop.
Write Python code to print the letters of the word "PYTHON" one by one.
Write Python code to print multiples of 7 from 7 to 70.
Write Python code to create a list and find its length.
questions.answer:
colors = ["red", "green", "blue", "yellow", "orange"]
c = len(colors)
print("Number of items:", c)
